sequence:
Taihou, Body and Soul

<size=45>Chapter 6: Taihou's Disappearance(?) - Part 1</size>

scripts.say: Little by little, I'd been getting used to Taihou.
I've prepared all your documents for the day right here, my Commander~
These are the urgent ones, the lower priority ones are down here, and the ones unworthy of my Commander's attention are in the trash.
Please let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.
My Commander's been working so hard. Please have some tea.
I went ahead and added that spice you were talking about with Yukikaze to your dinner.
I also drew a bath for you. And if your shoulders are sore I hope you'll let me rub them for youâ™ª
... What's wrong, my Commander? Could it be you...
... want to taste me? Want to bathe with me? Or maaaaybee~ You want to do some filthy, depraved things with me~?
I'd even gotten used to her saying stuff like that.
She would cross the line from time to time, but even so Taihou was an objectively dedicated secretary who took her job seriously. Still...
I worried she was neglecting her own health for my sake...
I decided it would probably be a good idea for Taihou to take a day off.
I saw a new emotion welling up inside Taihou, overpowering her. It was loneliness.
